properties.description: This Pipeline is sub pipeline of PL_KHCDE_GENERIC_MASTER pipeline.

activities.name: SP-Pipeline_Start
activities.description: Logs pipeline start in khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: EP-ServerCopy-Part1
activities.description: Execute the Part 1 of Server copy for the linked Services in the Server Copy Part 1

activities.name: GM-Go_NoGo
activities.description: Fetches go no go folder metadata

activities.name: IF-goAhead
activities.description:
This activity checks - 
1. go_no_go folder should not exists.
2. conatiner _name should be not null
3. stage_blob_name should be not null
4. archival_blob_name should be not null

activities.name: SP-Server Copy Part 2
activities.description: logs pipeline error in audit tables.

activities.name: SP-ActivityAndPipelineFailed02
activities.description: logs pipeline error in audit tables.

activities.description: Execute the Part 2 of Server copy for the linked Services in the Server Copy Part 2

activities.description: Update combined pipeline run id varible
